content: lasweater by emily o brien pattern by lasweater dress your labubu up in some handknits this boxy little crop top looks adorable on labubu and the best part is you can make your labubu a sweater in the same yarn as one of your sweaters so you can be twinsies notions size darning needle for weaving in ends sized to fit a labubu plush pendant stitch markers optional waste yarn or extra needles needles us 2 2 75mm 37 / 93cm circular needles or dpns or size needed to obtain gauge yarn sock/fingering a super tiny amont of yarn around 30 yards sample is knit with crow & crescent yarn callisto stock in arachne 2 © emily o brien 2025 all rights reserved pattern notes instructions this tiny sweater uses a bottom up drop shoulder construction i suggest you put in on your labubu feet first rather than putting it on waistband over the the head using the long tail cast on or your favorite stretchy cast on cast on 40 sts join to work in it s very small smaller than an adult sock so the round you will want to use dpns or magic loop for work 3 rounds of 1x1 twisted rib needles 1x1 twisted rib round 1 *k1tbl p1 repeat from * around abbreviations st s - stitch es knit one round round - round k knit the front and back are worked flat across half ktbl - knit through the back loop of the sts while you work the front 20 sts keep p purl the back 20sts on an extra needle or waste kfb- knit front and back yarn ssk slip slip knit k2tog knit two together front yds - yards worked flat across 20 sts increase - increased work 8 row of stockinette knit all sts on right side purl all sts on wrong side decrease - decreased row 9 k1 ssk k16 k2tog k1 18 sts row 10 purl row 11 k4 bind off 10 sts using jenny s surprisingly stretchy bind off k3 cut tail leave 6 in tail you willl have 4 sts on either side of the needle with the 10 bound of sts in the middle 3 © emily o brien 2025 all rights reserved back worked the same as the front graft the right shoulder sts from the front and back together using kitchener stitch graft the left shoulder sts from front and back together using kitchener stitch arms pick up and knit 24 sts along the arm hole spaced evenly around join to work in the round round 1 k1 ssk k to last 3 sts k2tog k1 22 sts work 1x1 twisted rib for 3 rnds bind off loosely in pattern collar pick up and knit 28 sts spaced evenly around neck hole work 1x1 twisted rib for 2 rnds bind off using jenny s surprisingly stretch bind off weave in all ends 4 © emily o brien 2025 all rights reserved more patterns milky
